Detailed Description

This module provides sqlite3 tile repository functions in the format used by the RMaps android app.

Usage:

  • constructor requires MapServ instance, because method 'get_tile_from_coord' is provided in the MapServ

Variable Documentation

string gmapcatcher::tilesRepo::tilesRepoRMaps.SQL_DATABASE_DDL
Initial value:
"""
CREATE TABLE "tiles"   (
    "x" INTEGER NOT NULL ,
    "y" INTEGER NOT NULL ,
    "z" INTEGER NOT NULL ,
    "s" INTEGER NOT NULL ,
    "image" BLOB NOT NULL ,
    PRIMARY KEY (x,y,z,s)
);
CREATE TABLE android_metadata (locale TEXT);
CREATE INDEX IND on tiles (x,y,z,s);
CREATE TABLE info(minzoom,maxzoom);
INSERT INTO android_metadata (locale) VALUES ("en_EN");
"""
